mapper.select: SELECT usage_dt, usage_amount FROM t_usage WHERE user_cd = #{user_cd} AND use_yn = 'Y' AND usage_dt >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH), '%Y-%m') ORDER BY usage_dt ASC;

SELECT l.local_nm AS localNm,
(SELECT AVG(u.usage_amount) FROM t_usage u JOIN t_user tu ON u.user_cd = tu.user_cd WHERE u.usage_dt = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') AND tu.local_cd = tu2.local_cd AND u.use_yn = 'Y' ) AS avgCurrentMonthUsage,
(SELECT u1.usage_amount FROM t_usage u1 WHERE u1.user_cd = #{user_cd} AND u1.usage_dt = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') AND u1.use_yn = 'Y' LIMIT 1 ) AS currentMonthUsage,
(SELECT u2.usage_amount FROM t_usage u2 WHERE u2.user_cd = #{user_cd} AND u2.usage_dt = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR), '%Y-%m') AND u2.use_yn = 'Y' LIMIT 1 ) AS lastYearSameMonthUsage,
(SELECT AVG(u3.usage_amount) FROM t_usage u3 WHERE u3.user_cd = #{user_cd} AND u3.usage_dt BETWEEN CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()), '-01') AND DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') AND u3.use_yn = 'Y' ) AS yearlyAvgUsage
FROM t_user tu2 JOIN t_local l ON tu2.local_cd = l.local_cd WHERE tu2.user_cd = #{user_cd};
